General.Name: Merchant Express Class A
General.Description: China Merchants Expressway Network & Technology Holdings Co.,Ltd. invests in and operates expressways, bridges, and tunnels in the People's Republic of China. The company operates expressways under the Jingjintang Expressway, Yongtaiwen Expressway, Beilun Port Expressway, Jiurui Expressway, Guixing Expressway, Guiyang Expressway, Yangping Expressway, Guilin Lingsan Expressway, Edong Bridge, Yuqian Expressway, Chongqing-Guizhou Expressway, Shanghai-Chongqing Expressway, Bofu Expressway, and Guihuang Highway names. It is also involved in the traffic and ecology technology, and intelligent transportation businesses. The company was formerly known as China Merchants Huajian Highway Investment Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to China Merchants Expressway Network & Technology Holdings Co.,Ltd. in September 2016. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. China Merchants Expressway Network & Technology Holdings Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Merchants Group Limited.
General.Address: China Merchants Office Building, Beijing, China, 100022
